description: KubernetesDaemonSetSpec defines the desired state of the Kubernetes daemonset resource.

container.description: Container defines the desired specification of main container.

name.description: Name of the daemonSet. When unset, this defaults to an autogenerated name.

patch.description: Patch defines how to perform the patch operation to daemonset

pod.description: Pod defines the desired specification of pod.

strategy.description: The daemonset strategy to use to replace existing pods with new ones.
